1604067166_mirrored_yurivict_github.body:
Hi guys,

Having the same issue in the docker Zeronet. Is there is a env variable to setup it ? 

Thanks for your works.

> You need to install docker-compose and run with the docker-compose.yml.
> Sample file:
> 
> ```
> version: '3'
> services:
> 
>   proxy:
>     container_name: proxy.zites.cf
>     image: nofish/zeronet
>     restart: always
>     environment:
>       ENABLE_TOR: "true"
>     volumes:
>       - ./data:/root/data
>       - ./log:/root/log
>       - ./zeronet.conf:/root/zeronet.conf
>     ports:
>       - "26552:26552"
>       - "127.0.0.1:43110:43110"
>     command: "sh -c ' ( [ -e /root/plugins/disabled-Multiuser ] && rm -rf /root/plugins/Multiuser && mv /root/plugins/disabled-Multiuser /root/plugins/Multiuser ) && (/usr/bin/tor &) && python zeronet.py --ui_host proxy.zites.cf 127.0.0.1:43110 --ui_ip 0.0.0.0 --fileserver_port 26552'"
> ```

Thanks ! 
I missed the "sh -c" in my section command that's why . Thanks a lot.

topic.title: Update the docker image on docker hub
topic.body:
Hi, 

It would be great to have the image updated. 

Thanks
